about.content: I’m Yahya Kayani—a developer who loves solving real problems with clean, scalable code. From building tools that streamline workflows to creating AI systems that help kids learn better, my work is about making tech useful. I’ve been fortunate to work on projects that challenged me to think beyond the obvious, whether optimizing database queries to cut load times or designing systems that scale under pressure. When I’m not coding, I’m either diving into the latest tech trends, organizing events for fellow tech enthusiasts, or just enjoying some downtime playing football.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science and Engineering
achievements: Second prize for final year project at the industrial Expo in University.

education.research: Conducting research on using NLP and Machine Learning to assist children’s reading skills and assessment.

responsibilities: Assisting in research projects focused on enhancing reading education through personalized NLP and ML-powered systems.
Presented research findings at the GI Conference, highlighting advancements in Natural Language Processing and Reading education.
Collaborating with faculty on data analysis, experiment design, and presentation of research findings.
Enhanced database performance by optimizing relational databases and implementing efficient queries, reducing application breakdowns by 15%.
Developed API microservices in Node.js and Python, increasing system efficiency by 20%.
Led full-stack development using React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL, improving system scalability and performance.
Integrated RESTful APIs with the front-end, ensuring seamless communication between the React-based UI and the backend services.
Deployed and maintained applications on AWS, utilizing Docker for containerization and CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment.
Implemented security features, such as JWT-based authentication, for secure user access and enhanced data protection.

projects.title: Heartbeat CRM Tool
projects.description: Architected and developed scalable CRM tools, improving workflows for real estate operations using AWS, RabbitMQ, and React. Built secure backend services in Node.js/NestJS, integrating ICS feeds for calendar synchronization. Leveraged containerized deployments (Docker) and CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient, error-free releases. Collaborated cross-functionally with QA and design teams, driving end-to-end testing with Jest, Mocha, and TDD methodologies.

projects.title: Replicate Face-Swap Application
projects.description: Designed a production-ready face-swap service utilizing Python APIs, Docker, and AWS S3 for scalable and secure image processing workflows. Established CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, automating tests and deployment to minimize manual interventions. Delivered a highly concurrent system with performance optimizations tailored for image processing tasks.

projects.title: Neural Edge
projects.description: Developed predictive healthcare models with a focus on real-time data processing using Python, SQLAlchemy, and Docker. Enhanced monitoring and debugging environments using AWS CloudWatch, integrated with Linux-based developer tools for consistent system performance. Delivered optimized SQL queries reducing data processing time by 30%, ensuring reliability in high-load scenarios. Utilized Agile methodologies, collaborating with cross-functional teams to meet tight deadlines.

projects.title: Numetrics
projects.description: Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines to automate testing, code reviews, and deployment, ensuring quick and consistent updates in production. Developed RESTful APIs to support data-driven insights for R&D teams, enabling them to identify productivity bottlenecks and receive targeted recommendations. Utilized Jest and Mocha for automated testing, following Test-Driven Development (TDD) to enhance code quality and maintainability. Optimized SQL queries and implemented database query caching, significantly improving data processing speeds for analytics workloads.

hackathons.title: Blue Hackathon
hackathons.description: Developed a solution for ocean sustainability and ghost gear management using IoT and cloud services.

hackathons.title: MLH Global Hackathon
hackathons.description: Collaborated on building an AI-based learning tool for children.

awards.title: Finalist
awards.description: Recognized for outstanding project presentation at the industrial Expo.

awards.title: Regional Qualifier
awards.event: Model CCI Parliamentary Provincial Debating Competition
awards.description: Advanced to the regional level in a national debating competition.

awards.title: Drama Organizer
awards.description: Organized drama events and coordinated with participants for performances.

researchPapers.title: DeBERTa Model Optimization for Long‑Form Text Annotation
researchPapers.description: Developed an automated text annotator for long‑form text using the DeBERTa model, enhancing deep learning tasks and transforming research notebooks into Docker-contained services.
